title: Can't redeem pre-paid card for LOL.
body: When i try to redeem the card it says "Eprepag redemption is not available at the moment. Please come back later." and i have  waited a day now .

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  If it's persisting, submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us, and our billing team can help you out individually.  We'll get back to you!
